meanings.definition: The act of interpreting or explaining a photograph.
meanings.sent1: Her photointerpretations helped me understand the picture better.
meanings.sent2: The book contained detailed photointerpretations of famous images.
meanings.sent3: His wild photointerpretations of family photos always made us laugh.
meanings.sent4: The artist's unique photointerpretations turned ordinary scenes into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: Through her photointerpretations, she brought life to old photographs.

meanings.definition: The result or product of interpreting a photograph.
meanings.sent1: The exhibition showcased various photointerpretations of nature photography.
meanings.sent2: I was amazed by the different photointerpretations of the same image.
meanings.sent3: The photointerpretations in the gallery were so creative and inspiring.
meanings.sent4: His photointerpretations added a new layer of meaning to the pictures.
meanings.sent5: The competition aimed to find the most innovative photointerpretations of the theme.
